title: Managed Care Specialist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC
Interview Descriptions: Multiple interviews with long gaps between.  Frustrating process with ultimately no closure.      Multiple interviews with long gaps between.  Frustrating process with ultimately no closure.    Multiple interviews with long gaps between.  Frustrating process with ultimately no closure.
Interview Questions: Performance based interview style format.

title: Grad Student Researcher Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC
Interview Descriptions: You either already have connections and they know they want you before you go in or could go somewhere better and they hope you settle. Otherwise they're just going to try to make you go away.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your research.

title: Staff Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC
Interview Descriptions: Over the course of nearly a full month, we scheduled an interview, which the interviewer never showed up to. He apologized and we rescheduled for later in the week. The day before our rescheduled interview, I received an email telling me that I was no longer being considered, despite never having been interviewed at the fault of the interviewer.
Interview Questions: I was not asked any questions.

title: Certified Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC in Jun 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview overall went smoothly. During the first interview they asked 11 questions and after answering all 11 questions, they started to explain the benefits that the job offers. After the first interview, they will schedule you for the 2nd interview.
Interview Questions: Tell me a little about yourself?

title: Social Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC (Oklahoma City, OK) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: three interviews were conducted for my interview. they were all over zoom. The first interview was with one person. The second interview was with a group and the third interview was with a single persons.
Interview Questions: Why are you looking to change careers?

title: Medical Student Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC
Interview Descriptions: very enjoyable and pleasant! all of the questions are straight from the behavioral questions provided to you by AAMC in some shape or form! there were 5 as such in the first half and in the second half, it was about my personal resume and application. The first part was blind but there is a break before the second half where they will look over your application
Interview Questions: Where is one time you practiced ethics.

title: Medical Student Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC (Oklahoma City, OK) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Great! Very friendly and all questions can be prepared from the AAMC website. Try to have a story that talks about multicultural activities, ethics, etc. The open portion was very relaxed and don't expect too many questions either if you have said enough.
Interview Questions: Describe a time when you were in a multicultural setting

title: Clinical Risk Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC (Oklahoma City, OK)
Interview Descriptions: One on one and then a small group interview followed by delays in Human Resources with any type of follow up.  Human resources then delayed the hiring process with their "internal processes" and lack of communication.
Interview Questions: Describe a problem and how you addressed it.

title: Graduate PhD Student Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC (Athens, OH) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: It was a long process. I had to be interviewed by the human resources, and then I had an interview with a fellow scientist about the research assistanship and the things I had to do during my studies
Interview Questions: How did you hear about the position?

title: Leadership and Volunteerism Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC (Oklahoma City, OK) in Nov 2018
Interview Descriptions: Came in for the first in person interview with the direct supervisor and 2 others in the office. I  was asked basic interview questions. Then there was a second interview with the director.
Interview Questions: Tell us something we can't find on your resume.

title: Research Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC (Oklahoma City, OK) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions:
I was called in to be interviewed by the HR representative and my now supervisor.
I was seated and they started by asking about my name and qualifications. 
This was followed by a little about my interests in the field.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths and your weakness?

title: Post Doctoral Fellow Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC (Oklahoma City, OK) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was comfortable and included an in-person interview,  a PP presentation of my current research to the departments, and lastly I had a one-one interview with all the members of the laboratory
Interview Questions: talk about your current research

title: Dietetic Intertnship Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC (Oklahoma City, OK) in Oct 2015
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview and skype.  Internship director called me to set up interview.  Had interview a few days later.  Very informal, the director asked me general questions such as.  Why did you apply here?  Expectations for the internship, career goals.  We went over my resume.  He then proceeded to ask me a clinical question, not very difficult.  If you get an interview they are very interested, you have a very good chance of matching!
Interview Questions: Clinical Question:  Explain the difference between CHF and CHD.

title: Accounting Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC (Oklahoma City, OK) in Aug 2015
Interview Descriptions: I was nervous at first but, when I arrived both people was very warm and welcoming I felt at ease. The only thing I would do different is have some questions wrote down to ask about the company.
Interview Questions: what makes you the best candidate for this job?

title: Research Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC (Oklahoma City, OK) in May 2015
Interview Descriptions: Application on jobs.ou.edu, 3 week wait for interview extension. Online application consisted of typical resume, cover letter, prior experience requirements.  Interviews were conducted on campus, in a somewhat unprofessional setting. Follow-up interview took place with the same PI.
Interview Questions: What are your views on animal work?

title: Patient Access Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC (Oklahoma City, OK) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: One on one with the supervisor and took about 15-30 mins. Wasn't intimidating, just the usual nervousness with any interview. Each interview can be different though, just depends from case to case.
Interview Questions: How do you handle conflict?

title: Postdoctoral Research Fellow Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC (Oklahoma City, OK) in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions:
Asked about work; contacted my previous supervisor; asked for a presentation; first telephonic and then skype interview; let know your current supervisor about the job interview.
Depends on the person who is interviewing.
Interview Questions: Just research related questions; asked for a presentation.

title: Senior Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC (Oklahoma City, OK) in Jul 2013
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and got called in for an interview. I had to come in 3 separate days to meet with 6 different people in HR and in the section that I applied for.  This was time consuming, but went fine. I was offered the job later the same day after the last round of interviews.
Interview Questions: How to deal with upset people calling.

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC in May 2013
Interview Descriptions: I started with a phone conversation with the team leader.  Then I submitted my resume.  Next I was interviewed by entire team with which I would be working.  I finally gave a presentation to the group so they could assess my skills as a presenter and educator.
Interview Questions: Describe some accommodations you have made for students?

title: Graduate Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at University of Oklahoma HSC in May 2012
Interview Descriptions: It was a  telephonic interview with the potential student seekers and the director of program. They were good while interview process and has queries about my resume, my interests and work life balance philosophy
Interview Questions: Area of interest, general resume questions, work life balance
